objects.text:
• Premium 100ml/3.4 fl. oz EDT
• Elegant glass bottle with gold cap
• Unisex scent for all occasions
• Long-lasting fragrance formula

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Refreshing Luxury in Every Spray
product_details.description:
• Premium 100ml/3.4 fl. oz Eau de Toilette fragrance suitable for all genders
• Elegant glass bottle with luxurious gold-tone cap design
• Vibrant turquoise packaging representing freshness and vitality
• Universal fresh scent perfect for daily wear and special occasions
• Professional-grade fragrance concentration for lasting performance
• Sophisticated yet versatile aroma suitable for any season
• Sleek, modern bottle design that enhances any vanity or dresser
• Travel-friendly size perfect for on-the-go freshness
• Luxurious presentation makes it an ideal gift choice
• Crafted by BELLAVITA®, a trusted name in personal care

banner_details:
The banner presents a clean and modern product promotion layout for a unisex perfume. The top-left features a bold header text layer (`heading`) in all caps, capturing brand attention in a dark tone. Positioned beneath is an elegantly styled tagline layer (`tagline`) in a cursive font, adding a sophisticated touch. A detailed description (`description`) follows to highlight key product features using bullet points. Mid-right visually balances with a sleek perfume bottle (`product_image`) that radiates freshness. The bottom-left contains a prominent price label (`price`) and a vibrant call-to-action button comprised of a rectangle (`cta_background`) and overlaid text (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Soft White: `#ffffff`
- Sky Blue Accent: `#0079c1`
- Deep Charcoal: `#212529`
- Gold (in image detailing)
- Light Grey Background: `#F2F2F2`
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern design dominated by a vivid teal-blue bottle (#00B9B0) that evokes freshness and clarity. This cool hue is contrasted with minimalistic, elegant gold accents, particularly on the cap (#D4AF37), adding a premium appeal. The white typography (#FFFFFF) stands out sharply against the teal background, ensuring high readability and a clean, crisp appearance. The smooth blending of teal shades across the bottle gives it a fluid and refreshing aesthetic, while the metallic gold cap reflects light, creating a luxurious highlight. This color palette is ideal for a banner evoking class, freshness, and sophistication.
